text: There is this very biased teacher in this school. I will not mention her name because even though she is very mean and petty, I believe that she is still considered nice to lower primary students and I don't want to ruin her image. Just because I left my CCA to focus more on my studies, she started targeting me in PE class and found a reason to scold me every lesson. She even went as far as to try to make my friends leave me! Luckily, they are true friends and didn't leave me. Now, the reason I gave this school a 5 star review is because other than her, the school is wonderful. Especially my form teachers. They always support me. Hopefully, the biased teacher will change. Thank you for taking your time to read this review. BTW, I think the biased teacher was the head of CCA and didn't like it when I left.

Love this school!!!! Ms Hon and Mdm DIng are my Math and Mother Tongue teachers respectively. If you somehow manage to get either of them. Good Job! (Ms Hon might not be there, but there's still Mdm Ding)
Wushu CCA is nice, if you don't mind martial art related things. I really love the library, it has a lot of my favourite books and if you accidentally forget to do any homework related to the computer, for school purposes of course, you can access the computers there.

It's quite a bad school in my opinion students r dumbtheyd ress like their going to a party they swear ,have TikTok being underaged like the only good thing I have heard about the school is affordable food in the school like go there and you'll see how many students score well it's like their school has no rules or anything
I am a  currently a student at BPS.The teachers here are really nice esp Ms Hon,Mr Goh, Mr Fahmy and Mdm Farhanah.

Highly recommend to let your children come this school,I was this year P6 student and a teacher is care about me and she teach my sister before the teacher is MDM Liza and she care about every student who in his maths class even tho she sometimes scold us but she still a nice teacher! If you happen to teach by that teacher,you're on the right track!
